Uses of Class
finalProject.OdometerExceptions

    • Uses of OdometerExceptions in finalProject

      Methods in finalProject that throw OdometerExceptions 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void Navigation.avoid​(double distance)
      this method is used to call the color classification and detect the color of the can and avoid the can during the travelling state
      static Odometer Odometer.getOdometer​()
      This class is meant to return the existing Odometer Object.
      static Odometer Odometer.getOdometer​(lejos.hardware.motor.EV3LargeRegulatedMotor leftMotor, lejos.hardware.motor.EV3LargeRegulatedMotor rightMotor, double TRACK, double WHEEL_RAD)
      This method is meant to ensure only one instance of the odometer is used throughout the code.
      static OdometerData OdometerData.getOdometerData​()
      OdometerData factory.
      void Navigation.leftAvoid​()
      the method help the car turn right,and determine whether need to test the color again,called by avoid function
      static void Final.main​(java.lang.String[] args)
      main class: receiving the parameter from the server and start the program
      void Navigation.RightAvoid​()
      the method help the car turn right,and determine whether need to test the color again,called by avoid function
      void Navigation.search​()
      the program will call the constructMap() method to generate the searchMap, the car will visit the point on the map one by one
      void Navigation.travelSearch​(double distance)
      when found a can when rotation, the car will stop and move to in front of the can and do the research
      void Navigation.travelTo​(double x, double y)
      the car will navigate to the point (x*tileSize,y*tileSize)
      void Navigation.travelTunnel​()
      the car will travel to near the tunnel ,do the localization and go through the tunnel
      void Navigation.turnSearch​()
      after the car reach the visit point in the search map, car will rotate about 360 to see if there is any can near the car
      void Navigation.work​()
      this function is the primary function in the navigation class,it calls other function to reach the destination
